name: Arbalist Agent
description:
Arbo is on a mission: breaking into the top secret facility of a foreign organization to steal the blueprint of a time bomb. This bomb is able to change the flow of time.

On his way out, he used time bombs he found in the lab to trick his opponents and secure the objective.

When Arbo leaves the building, he gets the choice to deliver the blueprint to his boss or keep it for himself. But what consequences does this have?

Note: This was a school project made in 1.5 Weeks also this is not made to run in a browser, but we had to deliver it in browser :)
